content: Here proof that i bet on stakehttps://www.loom.com/share/3e9d91e527c944a5839d987f6f7361e4fig will beat Moreno.  since fig train with henry cejudo he improved his bjj, take down defense, mindset etc. he trained with the goat and learn some tricks. moreno is childish when fig is more alpha as a man and more masculime and winner. check both records he has more wins as well. they do it on brazil on the country of fig this time as well. i believe his power will overwhelm  moreno and it will go to ko or decision by fig when moreno is  badly hurt.this is how it goes fig will win.of course moreno is dangerous and can submit him but i dont believe it will happen. fig improved a lot since he trained with henry cejudo he will take the w.easy money all in on Deiveson Figueiredo -He has more power, better mindset and they do it on Brazil this time which his his own country. last fight i predicted on this forum https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5429742.msg61457303#msg61457303

comments.author: Ucy
comments.created_time: January 20, 2023, 10:24:12 AMLast edit: January 21, 2023, 06:03:52 AM by Ucy
comments.body: Well, if you want your prediction to come to pass make sure your judgment/analysis is true. And you have to be a clean enough to see clearly to make that kind of true judgment... otherwise, you depend on luck or probability to win. And that would mean inconsistent achievements/wins.*Bet but don't gamble Post edited on Jan 21 , 2023 - 06:03am GMTPost before the edit can be found here: https://archive.fo/Ai1lh

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: I can see that you are very confidence about your choice and I cant understand estimate the power of choice. Although I am not a strong fan but I could remember that you once made this kind of prediction that many persons were skeptical if you will eventually win. It was a big surprise to later find out that your prediction was accurate. I love the string confident you do exert when influencing other gamblers to take a look on your prediction giving everyone the opportunity to win along with you. Maybe I will consider your prediction this time.

comments.author: Hydrogen
comments.body: Brandon Moreno was coached by James Krause in his last fight versus Kai Kara France. Now that Krause is suspended from the UFC on insider trading allegations. I wonder if it will upset Moreno's progression in martial arts. Figueiredo is a complete animal at 125. I think the main chance for him losing is if he has a bad weight cut. As was the case for their 2nd fight where Moreno finished him.Hope you win your bet. Being able to consistently win at gambling is a good feeling. Its like owning your own money printing machine.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Good luck, that's the spirit!I hope that $2981 of yours will become $6k. The moment of truth is about to happen later. Since you're proud of your past prediction, hopefully that this prediction of yours will also result into a positive one. And if so, I guess you'll often do a series of sharing of your predictions and bets.
